Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 12:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 20 mm near the North Shore. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
